resources.string: Type 1 is not afraid of spiders. His fear level will increase linear in a small amount. The patient only reaches max. 40% of full fear level.
Type 2 tries to avoid spiders. His fear level is already increased on the start and wil continue to increase faster as the spider comes closer.
Type 3 is afraid that the spider will hurt him. His fear level is low at the beginning, but will increase fast, if the spider has crossed a certain point.
